page.title: 17SUSSEX SUPERSTITIONS.
page.content: Here are some superstitions held by people living in Sussex. _____________GOOD LUCK_______________ Black cat crossing path.{See a pin, {pick it up, all the day you'll have {good luck.}See a haycart, don't look back after making wish.{Spill salt, {throw over left shoulder.}Hanging up horse shoe so: u.{See 2 magpies.} ______________BAD LUCK_______________ Hanging up horse shoe so: n.{Single {magpie.}Breaking mirror seven years bad luck.{Number 13* }Crooked picture. {Go into barn full of bales after dark. lf you lie on a grave, you die seven years earlier.{Two teeth opposite {missing.}Putting up umbrella indoors. _____________________________________ *On new Malling Estate no houses numbered 13.
